prologue.name: Ordinary World
prologue.description: The starting point of the hero's journey, where the hero is introduced in their normal environment.
key_events: Michael is a child witnessing his mother's death in a car accident. This traumatic event sets the stage for his journey ahead. She is killed by a demon while Michael is rescuded by a mysterious figure.

ordinary world.name: Ordinary World
ordinary world.description: The starting point of the hero's journey, where the hero is introduced in their normal environment.
key_events: Michael is talkking with a psychatrist about his mothers death. The psychatrist suggests he join a support group. in the form of a special crusade. he does this after seeing that michael has a spirt following him. He puts his glasses away telling him that it will be good for him
